content.raw:
the `RemoveModelFromWorld` feature doesn't reference `GetEntities`, but it seems to me that `RemoveModelByIndex` implies a dependence on the `GetEntities` feature, since that is the only thing that provides a model index

I will make an issue for this, since it's more of a question about code organization and not functionality
